captions.text: One evening, purple sky at the sunset
Short greetings ‘It's been a long time'
We clinked the glasses before it became awkward
and asked each other ‘how have you been?'
Your face and the way you talk
I just wanted to make you feel better
Love, and you are living inside me before I knew it
I couldn't even imagine ‘us' but now it's so comfortable
I just love you the way you are
I know you even if you don't tell

I know the love you give to me
You don't need to tell

comments.text:
Am I the only one finding this particular video of her is having irony in 
it? well I do not doubt, her voice and the song, but when u take a look on 
the lyrics, her expressions and the video, it's somehow contradictory. The 
song lyrics (I'm taking the point) is saying how grateful she is for his 
love partner, yet the atmosphere of the MV is lonely, even though at some 
point she's smiling, but somehow I can feel more of her loneliness on this 
video. Anyone had more thought of it? o.0﻿
